name: Rubicon 2017
description:
*‘Celebrated Cabernet-based Bordeaux flagship since its debut in 1980. 2017 Cabernet increased from 49% in 2016 (4.5 stars, 93 pts) to 68%, with Merlot, Cabernet Franc, and Petit Verdot. Classic, elegant; dark berry, cedary scents still introverted, though suggest depth and future complexity. Firm structure. 60% new oak.’* - Platter’s SA Wine Guide 2021, 5☆ (95/100)

 *'A classy wine from a really top vintage. What’s not to like, as they say? Marrying Cabernet Sauvignon with 32% Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, this is a subtle, refined, nuanced Rubicon with herbal, earthy, tobacco and graphite perfume, fine 60% new wood, polished tannins and a long, graceful finish. Traditional in style and rightly proud of it. 2023-32'* - Tim Atkin MW, SA Special Report 2021, 96/100


*‘The 2017 Rubicon, Meerlust's flagship Bordeaux blend (68% Cabernet Sauvignon, 16% Merlot, 12% Cabernet Franc, 4% Petit Verdot) offers attractive blackberry, raspberry coulis and floral scents on the nose, plus just a touch of glycerol. The palate is harmonious and medium-bodied with supple tannins, fine acidity and an almost understated but long finish.’* - Neal Martin, Vinous, 92/100 (Nov 2021)

 The wines will continue to be cellared at the Meerlust vintage cellar until maturity (estimated 2028) or withdrawal. Rubicon is not produced every year. If a vintage is not produced, the NFT will include the next vintage, to total 50 consecutive vintages
